languages.text: {n}Отвратительное подобие улыбки появляется на оплавленном лице.{/n} "Оглянись! Все, что ты видишь — это десятина. Священная плата Империуму. И где она? Почему не полетела к иным мирам, как нам обещали? Почему мы тут умираем от голода, а не воюем среди звезд? Да потому что нет там ничего..."

{n}The revolting semblance of a smile appears on his melted face.{/n} "Look around you! Everything you see was a tithe — a sacred payment to the Imperium. And what became of it? Why did it never travel to other worlds as we'd been promised? Why are we starving here instead of doing battle among the stars? Because there's nothing there, that's why..."
languages.original_text: {n}Отвратительное подобие улыбки появляется на оплавленном лице.{/n} "Оглянись! Все, что ты видишь — это десятина. Священная плата Империуму. И где она? Почему не полетела к иным мирам, как нам обещали? Почему мы тут умираем от голода, а не воюем среди звезд? Да потому что нет там ничего..."

Why did it never travel to other worlds as we'd been promised? Why are we starving here instead of doing battle among the stars? Because there's nothing there, that's why..."

Why did it never travel to other worlds as we'd been promised? Why are we starving here instead of doing battle among the stars? Because there's nothing there, that's why..."

Why did it never travel to other worlds as we'd been promised? Why are we starving here instead of doing battle among the stars? Because there's nothing there, that's why..."

languages.text: {n}Aparece un vomitivo intento de sonrisa en su cara derretida.{/n} «¡Mire a su alrededor! Todo lo que ve era el diezmo, el pago sagrado al Imperium. ¿Qué ha pasado con él? ¿Por qué no viajó a otros mundos, como se nos prometió? ¿Por qué nos morimos de hambre aquí en lugar de luchar entre las estrellas? Porque ya no queda nada, por eso...».
languages.original_text: {n}The revolting semblance of a smile appears on his melted face.{/n} "Look around you! Everything you see was a tithe — a sacred payment to the Imperium. And what became of it? Why did it never travel to other worlds as we'd been promised? Why are we starving here instead of doing battle among the stars? Because there's nothing there, that's why..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aparece un vomitivo intento de sonrisa en su cara derretida.{/n} «¡Mire a su alrededor! Todo lo que ve era el diezmo, el pago sagrado al Imperium. ¿Qué ha pasado con él? ¿Por qué no viajó a otros mundos, como se nos prometió? ¿Por qué nos morimos de hambre aquí en lugar de luchar entre las estrellas? Porque ya no queda nada, por eso...».

languages.text: {n}他被烧熔的脸上露出了令人作呕的笑容。{/n}“看看你周围吧！你周围的一切都是什一税，是献给帝国的神圣祭品，可它变成了什么样子？他们许诺过，会把我们带到其他世界，可为什么他们的许诺从来没有实现？为什么我们没有在群星之中厮杀，却要在这里挨饿？因为那里什么都没有，这就是原因……”
languages.original_text: {n}The revolting semblance of a smile appears on his melted face.{/n} "Look around you! Everything you see was a tithe — a sacred payment to the Imperium. And what became of it? Why did it never travel to other worlds as we'd been promised? Why are we starving here instead of doing battle among the stars? Because there's nothing there, that's why..."

traits.locale_text: {n}他被烧熔的脸上露出了令人作呕的笑容。{/n}“看看你周围吧！你周围的一切都是什一税，是献给帝国的神圣祭品，可它变成了什么样子？他们许诺过，会把我们带到其他世界，可为什么他们的许诺从来没有实现？为什么我们没有在群星之中厮杀，却要在这里挨饿？因为那里什么都没有，这就是原因……”

languages.text: {n}極めて不愉快な見せかけの笑顔を彼の溶けた顔に浮かべる。{/n}「あんたの周りを見てみろ！目に見えるものはすべて租税だ―帝国への聖なる支払いだ。それが何になる？約束されたように他の惑星に行けないのはなぜだ？惑星の間で戦闘する代わりにここで飢えているのはなぜだ？向こうには何もないからだ、それが理由だ…」
languages.original_text: {n}The revolting semblance of a smile appears on his melted face.{/n} "Look around you! Everything you see was a tithe — a sacred payment to the Imperium. And what became of it? Why did it never travel to other worlds as we'd been promised? Why are we starving here instead of doing battle among the stars? Because there's nothing there, that's why..."

traits.locale_text: {n}極めて不愉快な見せかけの笑顔を彼の溶けた顔に浮かべる。{/n}「あんたの周りを見てみろ！目に見えるものはすべて租税だ―帝国への聖なる支払いだ。それが何になる？約束されたように他の惑星に行けないのはなぜだ？惑星の間で戦闘する代わりにここで飢えているのはなぜだ？向こうには何もないからだ、それが理由だ…」

languages.text: {n}Un semblant de sourire cauchemardesque apparaît sur ses traits méconnaissables.{/n} « Regardez autour de vous ! Tout ce que vous voyez ici faisait partie de la dîme, ce tribut sacré versé à l'Imperium. Avouez que c'est un beau gâchis. Pourquoi rien de tout ça n'a jamais rallié d'autres mondes, comme on nous l'avait promis ? Pourquoi sommes-nous coincés ici à mourir de faim au lieu de livrer bataille parmi les étoiles ? Parce qu'il n'y a rien d'autre là-bas qu'un grand vide, voilà pourquoi... »
languages.original_text: {n}The revolting semblance of a smile appears on his melted face.{/n} "Look around you! Everything you see was a tithe — a sacred payment to the Imperium. And what became of it? Why did it never travel to other worlds as we'd been promised? Why are we starving here instead of doing battle among the stars? Because there's nothing there, that's why..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un semblant de sourire cauchemardesque apparaît sur ses traits méconnaissables.{/n} « Regardez autour de vous ! Tout ce que vous voyez ici faisait partie de la dîme, ce tribut sacré versé à l'Imperium. Avouez que c'est un beau gâchis. Pourquoi rien de tout ça n'a jamais rallié d'autres mondes, comme on nous l'avait promis ? Pourquoi sommes-nous coincés ici à mourir de faim au lieu de livrer bataille parmi les étoiles ? Parce qu'il n'y a rien d'autre là-bas qu'un grand vide, voilà pourquoi... »

languages.text: {n}Erimiş yüzünde iğrenç bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Bak! Buradaki her şey aşardı, İmparatorluk'a yapılan kutsal bir ödemeydi. Aşara ne oldu? Neden söz verildiği gibi başka dünyalara gitmedi? Neden yıldızlar arasında savaşmak yerine burada açlıktan kırılıyoruz? Yıldızlar arasında hiçbir şey yok da ondan..."
languages.original_text: {n}The revolting semblance of a smile appears on his melted face.{/n} "Look around you! Everything you see was a tithe — a sacred payment to the Imperium. And what became of it? Why did it never travel to other worlds as we'd been promised? Why are we starving here instead of doing battle among the stars? Because there's nothing there, that's why..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Erimiş yüzünde iğrenç bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Bak! Buradaki her şey aşardı, İmparatorluk'a yapılan kutsal bir ödemeydi. Aşara ne oldu? Neden söz verildiği gibi başka dünyalara gitmedi? Neden yıldızlar arasında savaşmak yerine burada açlıktan kırılıyoruz? Yıldızlar arasında hiçbir şey yok da ondan..."

languages.text: {n}Ein abstoßendes Lächeln huscht über sein geschmolzenes Gesicht.{/n} "Seht Euch um! Alles, was Ihr seht, war ein Zehnt ... eine heilige Zahlung an das Imperium. Und was wurde daraus? Warum sind wir nie wie versprochen zu anderen Welten gereist? Warum verhungern wir hier, anstatt zwischen den Sternen zu kämpfen? Weil es dort nichts gibt, das ist der Grund ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The revolting semblance of a smile appears on his melted face.{/n} "Look around you! Everything you see was a tithe — a sacred payment to the Imperium. And what became of it? Why did it never travel to other worlds as we'd been promised? Why are we starving here instead of doing battle among the stars? Because there's nothing there, that's why..."
